name: UNILOGUE
description:
This is a story of a faraway country. People lived in fear of demons.
But now is the time for them to rise up!
Let's explore all kinds of dungeons and fight for freedom and peace!

"UNILOGUE" is a game that combines tower defense and roguelike!
Form the best party you can think of and go on endless adventures!
Can you defeat the powerful enemies at the end of your adventure...

What kind of game?

  • Rogue-like adventures with a unique randomness.
  • Create a party of your choice from more than 50 friends!
  • Hard tower defense that cannot be recovered even after clearing a stage.
  • Enemies are all full of character.
  • Lots of items to choose from, from jewels to Excalibur!
  • You can even fight dragons!
  • Play time is 10 minutes to 1 hour per game.
